The Next Big Thing!

Let’s Start

Full-cycle Web App Development Services for All Your Needs

Custom Web App Development

Our custom web app developers can create tailored web applications to address your business goals, delivering personalized solutions that align with your specific requirements.

Progressive Web App Development

Our developers create PWA with cross-platform compatibility that enables seamless user experiences, ensuring your app runs smoothly on any device — online or offline.

Web App UI/UX Design

Our skilled UI/UX experts will create apps with visually appealing interfaces that delight users. Enhance engagement, usability, and overall satisfaction of your customers.

E-commerce web App development

Boost your online sales and organize operations with our eCommerce web app development services that allow us to provide a seamless shopping experience for your customers.

Web App Development for Startups

Empower your startup's growth with our expertise in developing scalable and reliable web applications that help you establish a strong online presence and drive business success — all that keeping budget in mind!

Backend Web App Development

Our expert backend developers ensure a robust and efficient infrastructure that creates organized data management and integration for the smooth functioning of your web application.

Front-end Web Development

We can craft visually appealing and user-friendly front-end interfaces that enhance the user experience and ensure a smooth and engaging interaction with your web application.

Web App Optimization & Maintenance

Scale up and revamp your existing app with us to ensure your web app performs at its best, keeping it secure, up-to-date, and delivering optimal user experiences.

Web Portal Development

Centralize and streamline your business operations with efficient content management, user engagement, and collaboration with our dynamic web portals.

SaaS Web App Development

Streamline your operations, reduce costs, and get scalable solutions for your business to solve problems and achieve exponential growth.

Build Apps That People Can't Stop Talking About​

We really enjoyed working with Codevian. We found the team to be super talented and patient during the design process. I would highly recommend them for any mobile app project.

Dr Hassan, Moodit, UK

At Codevian, we specialize in developing web applications that your users will find appealing and easy to use.

From smooth and captivating interfaces to modern and dynamic functionality, we put together user-centric design principles with creative technologies to deliver web apps that leave a lasting impression and increase retention rates.  

But it doesn’t end here. Our web app development solutions go beyond just user satisfaction. We can tackle your unique business problems head-on. Whether it’s streamlining operations, managing data or improving productivity — we develop customized web apps that provide practical solutions and drive tangible results. Let us transform your ideas into remarkable applications that not also solve your business challenges but also your users find useful. 

 

Our Web App Development Process Looks like This

1. Brainstorming and Planning

We kickstart your project by first understanding your goals, then conducting thorough research, and brainstorming innovative ideas. Our team develop a strategic plan that outlines the project scope, timelines, and objectives — this forms a solid foundation for success.

2. Designing

Our team of expert UI/UX designers transform your vision into captivating visuals and intuitive user interfaces. With an eye on user experience (UX) design, we create wireframes, prototypes, and designs.

3. Development

Our experienced web app developers use the latest technologies to build the core functionalities of your web app. We follow industry best practices, coding standards, and agile methodologies for robust and high-performance web apps.

4. DevOps Integration

We maximise communication between the development and operations teams by seamlessly integrating DevOps practices. This guarantees automated testing, continuous integration, and quick deployment, improving efficiency throughout the development lifecycle.

5. QC and Launch

We conduct rigorous quality assurance (QA) and testing processes to identify and rectify any bugs or issues and implement enhancements. Once the web app meets our stringent quality standards, we launch it, ensuring a smooth deployment.

6. Support and Maintenance

Once your web app is live and running, we provide ongoing support and maintenance services to keep your web app secure, up-to-date, and optimized. If we encounter any issue, we address it promptly, keeping your app running smoothly and evolving with your business needs.

Why should you augment your team with our resources?

01

Utilise our knowledge of state-of-the-art web app development frameworks and technologies to give your projects the best performance and scalability possible.

02

Our emphasis on producing responsive and user-friendly web applications enables smooth user interactions.

03

Utilise our knowledge to effectively manage database management, API integrations, and complicated functionality, providing strong and customised web app solutions.

04

Use our extensive front-end language expertise to create dynamic online applications that will astonish your users.

05

Count on our history of completing high-quality projects on time and within budget to ensure effective and economical web app development.

06

Through our staff augmentation services, you can easily integrate our expert developers into your team to accelerate development and achieve extraordinary results together.

Expand Your Team with Our Dedicated Web App Developers

Get fruitful results and execute your projects with ease through our resource-as-a-service model. By hiring our skilled web developers, you can enhance your in-house capabilities and achieve your project goals more efficiently.

Hire Our Developers

Why Choose Codevian?

We have a track record of successfully delivering great online solutions that combine modern technology with innovative design. Our skilled web app developers’ dedication to quality assures that your project is in the hands of professionals who place a high priority on excellence in all areas of development.

Experience in Tackling Complex Web Projects

Our seasoned team excels in handling complicated web projects, ensuring prompt execution and successful outcomes for your most challenging requirements.

Reliable and Responsible:

We take pride in our dependable and responsible approach, delivering on our promises and providing constant support throughout the web app development journey.

Modern Technology

Leveraging the latest and most advanced technologies, we build cutting-edge web apps that are efficient, scalable, and equipped to meet the evolving demands of today’s digital landscape.

On-time Deployment

We prioritize timely deployment without compromising quality and we adhere to project timelines, enabling you to launch your web app and gain a competitive edge.

Low Production Cost

Our strategic processes and efficient workflows enable us to deliver high-quality web app solutions at competitive prices, providing great value for your investment.

Customer-centric Approach

Our focus is always on understanding your needs and delivering personalized web app solutions that align with your goals.

Technologies we use

We harness a wide range of potent cutting-edge technologies to design adaptable and dynamic web apps that meet the needs of today’s users. Our expertise covers everything from strong back-end solutions to streamlined front-end frameworks, delivering seamless functionality and the best possible user experiences.

Industries We Cater for a Perfect Web App

Our custom web app solutions for the healthcare & medical industry optimize patient management and secure data handling. Our custom app solution also enhances telemedicine capabilities for smooth healthcare delivery and compliance with regulatory requirements.

Web App Development for Startups​

Launch your innovative ideas quickly and scale your business with our custom web app development. We help you gain a competitive edge in the market with unique features and user-friendly interfaces.

E-commerce Web App Development​

Our e-commerce web app development team help you set up your online store and manage operations smoothly. We can help you with a user-friendly platform, payment integration, inventory management, and personalized shopping experiences to skyrocket sales.

Enterprise Web App Development

Our enterprise web app solutions streamline operations, improve internal collaboration, and enhance productivity within your team. Features like project management, document sharing, employee portals, and custom integrations, can empower your organization for growth and efficiency.

Web App for Supply Chain Management and Logistics

Our web app development for supply chain management offers real-time visibility, inventory tracking, and easy communication. We help you launch web apps with efficient logistics management and smooth operation that reduces costs and optimizies supply chain performance.

Fintech Web App Development

Stand out in the FinTech industry with our FinTech web app solutions that encompass secure payment gateways, online banking, and investment management tools. With powerful analytics, we can help your organization to deliver innovative financial solutions and personalized experiences to your audience.

Edtech Web App Development

Enhance education with our EdTech web app development that provides e-learning platforms, interactive course management, student progress tracking, and more. We can integrate collaboration tools for engaging learning experiences for both — students and educators.

It’s the perfect time to maximize efficiency and growth

Solve all your business challenges and make your next “big thing” a reality with our web app development services.

Schedule a call

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 1200+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey

President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon

CEO at BullHead City web

Great Company This a great company. The pricing is great and they are smart, reliable and passionate. They offer great solutions to complicated problems. They are always available and very flexible.

Sujith Papali

Director at Hireseat LLP

A very professional and responsive approach to achieve customer goals. Developed Very high Quality BtoC Ecommerce app for our Bhaki Domian

Dilip Joshi

AVP - IT & Engineering at Shemaroo Entertainment Ltd

The new tool helps the internal team save over two hours a day, meeting their expectations. Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and dedicated.

Deepesh G.

CEO at Mpos and Brooms

I have an excellent experience with Codevian's delivery teams. They have good, established processes to deliver a high quality product. More importantly, whenever there's any problem, the team is able to quickly respond and work towards the solution

Vinay Darp

CEO at XtentTeam LLP

Latest Updates from Our Experts

Case Studies

View all case studies

Web App Development FAQs

At our organization, addressing the most commonly asked questions is our top priority. If you don’t see the exact one, don’t fret—we’re delighted to respond to your inquiries. To get in touch, simply click the link below. Our professionals are here to assist you.

Contact Us
What is the price of developing a web app?

The cost of developing a web app varies based on factors like complexity, features, customization, and scope of the work. We understand that all projects have a certain budget threshold and so we offer competitive pricing based on a thorough assessment of your specific requirements.

How much time does it take for developing a web app?

The development time for a web app depends on the scope and complexity of the project. We work diligently to deliver efficient solutions, and timelines can vary from a few weeks for simpler apps to several months for more complex ones.

Can you develop responsive and mobile-friendly web apps?

Yes, we specialize in creating responsive and mobile-friendly web apps that provide an optimal user experience across different devices and screen sizes. This ensures good accessibility and high engagement.

What is the difference between progressive web app development and web app development?

While web app development focuses on creating applications accessible through web browsers, progressive web app development incorporates modern features like offline access, push notifications, and app-like experiences, enhancing user engagement and functionality.

Can we outsource our web app development requirements to you?

Yes, you can confidently outsource your web app development requirements to us. We have a skilled team of experts who can handle your project efficiently, ensuring high-quality results and timely delivery, while you focus on your core business activities.
